briefTitle: Grouping Immune-modulation With Cryoablation (LOGIC) for Breast Cancers
officialTitle: Local Therapy Optimization by Grouping Immune-modulation With Cryoablation (LOGIC) for High Risk Breast Cancers
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Females
* Stage I/II Cancer
* Age range 18 - 90 years
* Diagnoses: Invasive carcinoma, ER -, PR-, HER2- (triple negative)
* Radiology findings: Unifocal disease visible on ultrasound

Exclusion Criteria:

* Additional primary cancer
* Inflammatory breast cancer
* History of autoimmune disease
* History of chronic immunosuppression
* Prior immunotherapy
* Recent vaccination (within 4 wks.)
* Prior radiation therapy
* Prior investigational agent therapy within last 1 year
* Pregnancy at the time of diagnosis and/ or treatment
* Breast feeding
